name: Space Invader (fabdynamic)
description:
Leave a comment with your high score!

These cool youtubers made a great video about programming a new Commodore 64 game.  It was made in Assembly for the Commodore and its really cool to see all of the tricks the author used to make the game.  

This game was inspired by the game that they detail in the video.  Its not as good as the game in the video in part because its missing some key features, but I still like playing it!  

How to play: Press the left alt key or click the mouse button to fire.  Whenever you fire the ship switches direction.  

My high score is 52 (see the video). Leave a comment with your high score!
